import React from 'react'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; function NewProductForm(props:any) { const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm(); console.log(props.productInformation) return (

{props.productTitleToAddForUser}

Unit: {props.productInformation.unit}

For Standard Size: {props.productInformation.standard_size}

Recurrance: {props.productInformation.use_days} days

{/*

Recurrance:

For Standard Size

*/}
) } export default NewProductForm
